sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-header>    </el-header>
    <el-aside style="width: 200px;margin-top: 20px">
      <SideMenu @indexSelect="listByCategory" ref="sideMenu"></SideMenu>
    </el-aside>
    <el-main>
<!--      <Books class="books-area" ref="booksArea"></Books>-->
      <Products image-url="11" price="11" name="11" class="custom-card"></Products>
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue';
// import SideMenu from './SideMenu.vue';
// import Books from './Books.vue';
import Products from "@/components/market/Products.vue";

export default {
  name: 'AppLibrary',
  components: {
    // Books,
    // SideMenu,
    Products,
  },
  setup() {
    const booksArea = ref(null);

    const listByCategory = () => {
      const cid = this.$refs.sideMenu.cid;
      const url = 'categories/' + cid + '/books';
      this.$axios.get(url).then((resp) => {
        if (resp && resp.status === 200) {
          booksArea.value.books = resp.data;
        }
      });
    };

    return {
      booksArea,
      listByCategory,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.books-area {
  width: 990px;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}
.custom-card{
  width:500px;
  height: 400px;
}
</style>
